attributes.action: Reduce VAT for the hospitality sector to no more than 10%
attributes.additional_details:
Implement a significant reduction in Value Added Tax (VAT) rates applicable to the hospitality sector. We believe this reduction is vital to alleviate the financial burden on businesses and stimulate consumer spending, ultimately aiding in the hospitality sector’s recover.
 
The UK Government can play a pivotal role in safeguarding the future of the hospitality sector, preserving jobs, and revitalizing local economies.
attributes.background: We would like a VAT reduction for the hospitality sector in order to support hospitality businesses, many of which are struggling through no fault of their own.
